column1: 'It would be awful if Philippe Coutinho left Liverpool for Barcelona'  Roberto Firmino
GOAL Awful stuff from Hoffenheim, Henderson takes advantage and lays it on a plate for Roberto Firmino: 41
GOAL It's been all Liverpool, and Roberto Firmino breaks the deadlock by nodding beyond Petr Cech
Roberto Firmino hits the post from the penalty spot after Sadio Mane was brought down in the box
